51.name: KENGREXAL
51.findMessage: Searching for something of note you come across, oh, oh that’s not... Why is that even here? You’re not sure why but you seem to have found a vial of KENGREXAL! This seems out of place here, better call it in just in case.

1.name: Wand of Gorgeousness
1.findMessage: In the center of the intersection a small amythest encrusted stick sticks out. Picking at it your dull self gains a new sense of style. You found the Wand of Gorgeousness!

2.name: Pocket Watch of Shreeping
2.findMessage: A small timepiece sits within the ice below slowly ticking towards the next night. You found the Pocket Watch of Shreeping!

3.name: Knight’s Helm
3.findMessage: Atop a grave sits a prestine helmet clearly well taken care of. You found the Knight’s Helm!

4.name: Golden Eye
4.findMessage: Floating in the small pool of water, a small glittery orb blinks back at you. You found the Golden Eye!

5.name: CF-135
5.findMessage: Amidst the small dwelling a model rocket lays dormant but ready to go. You found CF-135!

6.name: Butcher’s Apron
6.findMessage: Washed up along the shore you find a garment soaked through with blood. You found the Butcher’s Apron!

7.name: Hypnotic Bandana
7.findMessage: Amidst the pile of gold you sense a glare in your direction coming from a small piece of cloth. You found the Hypnotic Bandana!

8.name: Tome of the Hills
8.findMessage: A book is laying undisturbed amongst the death and decay while spewing forth countless phrases of insight. You found the Tome of the Hills!

9.name: Axe of the Screamin’ Void
9.findMessage: Within the piles of ore you hear what sounds like several rock bands playing at full volume. You found the Axe of the Screamin’ Void!

10.name: Chisel of the Undead Sculptress
10.findMessage: Sitting atop the desk is the freshest hand you’ve ever seen, its lively green digits still gripping onto its sculptor’s tool. You found the Chisel of the Undead Sculptress!

11.name: Death Loop
11.findMessage: Along the mineshaft’s walls you find a necklace remembering one of it’s countlessly laughable demises. You found the Death Loop!

12.name: Pearl of Cleansing
12.findMessage: A small section of the cave glows towards you as a small ball seems to be eradicating any nearby dirt and grime. You found the Pearl of Cleansing!

13.name: The Slab
13.findMessage: Within the tower you see a one of a kind block that looks to be a bundle of dynamite with the bottom of every stick cut off. You found The Slab!

14.name: The Skadoodler
14.findMessage: Within the tower you find a small device making several larger automations. Seconds after it is done, its project fails spectacularly. You found The Skadoodler!

15.name: An Old Friend’s Pickaxe
15.findMessage: Hanging proudly on the inside wall of the tower is a pickaxe clearly being well kept by those close. You found An Old Friend’s Pickaxe!

16.name: Gem of Greatness
16.findMessage: Beneath the eastern statue a slight gleam of an impressive jewel catches your eye. You found the Gem of Greatness!

180.findMessage: Hidden beneath the altar you find a small slip of paper. It reads “The eggs are searching for their artifacts. Connect their artifacts to them and they’ll help you find your artifact. Compass should be set to the total value of the artifacts that are used. Floor 1’s artifacts are on upper, Floor 2’s are on middle, and Floor 3’s are on lower.”

70.name: Muffin of Blue Skies
70.findMessage: You have found the secret artifact Muffin of Blue Skies! It is worth 34 Frost Embers.

45.name: Order of Life
45.findMessage: You have found the secret artifact Order of Life! It is worth 19 Frost Embers.

41.name: Chef Mizan’s Dynamite Surprise
41.findMessage: You have found the secret artifact Chef Mizan’s Dynamite Surprise! It is worth 48 Frost Embers.

58.name: Shroom of the Warrior
58.findMessage: You have found the secret artifact Shroom of the Warrior! It is worth 39 Frost Embers.

20.name: Morpheus’ Razor
20.findMessage: You have found the secret artifact Morpheus’ Razor! It is worth 51 Frost Embers.

33.findMessage: Within the piles of the miner’s collectibles, a small slip of paper sticks out waiting to be read. “What you seek is at (X=Negative floor 1 secret product, Z=Floor 2 secret product) with Compass=Floor 3 secret, Floor=4.”
